param.name: id
param.label: Location ID
param.description: The ID# location you want to display

param.name: address_template
param.label: Item address format
param.description: The format of the address. Fields are lowercase and in curly brackets. HTML Tags are in square brackets, (E.g. [br][p][/p]) Items with a [br] tag directly after them (no spaces) that are blank will also omit the the [br] tag

param.name: map_address_template
param.label: Map popup item address format
param.description: The format of the address and information that appears in the Google Map popup window. Fields are lowercase and in curly brackets. HTML Tags are in square brackets, (E.g. [br][p][/p]) Items with a [br] tag directly after them (no spaces) that are blank will also omit the the [br] tag

param.name: linktarget
param.label: Open link in new window?
param.description: This will set the entry's link to open in a new window. This controls only the behavior of the item's link field.

param.name: linkhttp
param.label: Add HTTP to link?
param.description: This add http:// to the link

param.name: triggercontentplugin
param.label: Trigger content plugins?
param.description: This will execute content preparation plugins on each directory entry. May cause performance degradation with many plugins

param.name: showmaponitempage
param.label: Show map on item page?
param.description: Shows a small map with the marker on the item page.

param.name: showmarkeronitempage
param.label: Popup marker on item page?
param.description: Shows a small marker info window in the map by default.

param.name: item_gmap_default_zoom
param.label: Item Page Map Zoom
param.description: Default Zoom of the map on the item page

param.name: item_gmap_width
param.label: Item Page Map Width
param.description: Map width in pixels of the map displayed on the individual location's page (E.g: 500).

param.name: item_gmap_height
param.label: Item Page Map Height
param.description: Map height in pixels of the map displayed on the individual location's page (E.g: 500).

param.name: defaultmapview
param.label: Default Map View
param.description: Sets the default type of Google Map display

param.name: domhook
param.label: DOM Load Event?
param.description: ADVANCED ONLY: This allows you to switch between the various page load events that we use to initialize the Google Map. Try different settings here if your map does not display.
